message:
Hello, 
Many thanks for having accepting me on this group ! I'm one of the co-founder of Voxe.org. At Voxe we hack democracy with our neutral and international comparison platform for political programs. We're currently finalist of the Google Impact Challenge French Chapter. 
We need your votes to win that challenge. 500K€ are at stake ! 500k that would help us develop a Newswatch app to foster citizen empowerment.

Here is the link to vote. It would be so great if could vote for us and share it ! https://impactchallenge.withgoogle.com/france2015/charity/voxe
(sorry it's in French, Google didn't translate it. But the video is subtitled in English)

Many thanks ! 

Charlotte Richard
story: Charlotte Richard shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Encouragez une information neutre et claire sur la politique. Votez pour ce projet et aidez Voxe.org à remporter 500 000€ #GoogleImpactChallenge https://goo.gl/vy8qUy
name: Google Impact Challenge | France 2015
caption: impactchallenge.withgoogle.com
